title: Technical Writer
description: DocuTech is looking for a Technical Writer to create clear documentation. You'll work with engineers to document APIs, features, and processes for users and developers.
responsibilities: Design and implement technical writer solutions that meet business requirements
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices
Contribute to documentation and knowledge sharing
requirements: 2+ years of experience in technical writer or similar role
Strong knowledge of Technical Documentation, API Documentation, Markdown
Experience with Information Architecture and Editing
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience)
nice_to_have: Previous experience in a similar industry
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
